title: Population of Michigan , by race and ethnicity 2018
summary: This statistic shows the Population of Michigan , distinguished by American_Indian_and_Alaska_Native_alone and Hispanic_or_Latino_(of_any_race) origin in 2018 .
In 2018 , about 1363183 million people in Michigan were Black_or_African_American_alone or .

data.Race: American Indian and Alaska Native alone

gold: This statistic shows the population of Michigan , distinguished by race and Hispanic origin in 2018 . In 2018 , about 1.36 million people in Michigan were Black or African American .
